page.title: 19Transport in Pennington
page.content: In our village of Pennington there is a danger to safety.It is the main road. The main road is the A590 which stretches fron Barrow to Ulverston and leads to the A6.Although we could not do without the A590,people do not like it because of speeding vehicles and pollution from the fumes.Some people say that it cuts the village in two because sometimes you have to wait for about five minutes before you can cross the road.We need a by-pass or a subway.We are very lucky because we have a lolly pop lady.When we went to the A590 to do a traffic survey,we noticed that the vehicles,especially cars and heavy lorries,seemed to be going very fast.
